title: SKCanvasView in Viewcell does not redraw automatically when it's appeared. (iOS)
body:
Testing enviroment.
XF ver : 2.4.0.280 stable
Skiasharp : 1.59.1
Xamarin.iOS : 11.0.0.0

- ListView.xaml
CachingStrategy="RecycleElement" ON

- ViewCell.xaml
```
<ViewCell>
  <AbsoluteLayout>
    <StackLayout>
      <SKCanvasView>
    </StackLayout>
  </AbsoluteLayout>
</ViewCell>
```

When I scroll down to bottom and back, SKCanvasView does not redraw correctly.

Workaround : 
If I call mySKView.InvalidateSurface(); in OnAppearing() in the VIewCell, it works correctly.
But I don't know if it's necessary.
